1.0.0.name: connect20/Evince_attribute_image
1.0.0.description: You can upload image of attribute & display attribute image for attribute type Multi-select and dropdown.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.0.1.name: connect20/Evince_attribute_image
1.0.1.description:
This extension allows administrator to add different images for different attributes. 
Buyer can have better idea about product by seeing different images for attribute. For example red color has different image than blue color of same product.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
